page.title: 02An Impression of Sutton
page.content: Our names are Emma Kelly and Laura Richardson.We both live on the Seddons estate in Sutton.We go to Hollinhey C.P.School. From our houses we can see many hills and fields.We can also see the church of Sutton St.James which has the old school and the scout hut which we use,nearby If we are sent on an errand we can walk to the local shop which is a general store which sells nearly everything and is also a post office. We usually play in our gardens but there are playing fields at Cop Meadow. From the estate we can see Sutton Hall,an old Tudor building, now a hotel.On our way to school we pass the village war memorial,which is near the Rossendale which joins the Bollin River at Gurnett.We like living here.
